mapper.sql: id, weixin_id, nick, logo, gmt_created, gmt_updated
mapper.update: update digcoo_anas_user set weixin_id = #{weixinId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nick = #{nick,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, logo = #{logo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_created = #{gmtCreated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_updated = #{gmtUpdated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
